特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: Lectures, case discussions, and presentations(and/or short term paper).

第1回: Course Introduction & Basic understanding of Japanese marketing communication
第3回: typical exmaples of Japanese marketing communication:Nissin cup noodle and Nestle ambassador
第11回: Eigyo, Japanese style of buidling communication with customers
トピック.授業外学習2: The student is expected to prepare for classes by completing the reading assignments with strong interest in Japanese marketing communication, brand strategies, and cultural history.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【300】総合日本学習科目（マーケティング・コミュニケーション）／JSC Marketing Communication
